A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney has made another snarky MCU movie. They decided to turn the greatest Jedi ever into a pouty 4yr old. Rey and Kylo were the only bright spots. They brought back Phasma for absolutely no reason. BB-8 is the most intelligent being in the Galaxy who can drive an AT-ST...really? And force ghosts can now effect the real world....so all Jedi should die so they can rule the world
